document_data.mainbody: Katakuda''', also known as '''dragonskin''', was a [[drug]] that originated somewhere in the lands of [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Description:
In its usable form, the drug appeared as a brown paste that was applied directly on the skin.

A single dose cost 100 [[gp]] in [[Faer√ªn]], after it was imported from the east.
document_data.Effects: When applied, katakuda hardened the user's skin for a duration of a half hour. After that time, the user's muscles went into spasms, causing incredible pain.
document_data.Usage: Developed by an order of [[monk]]s, the substance greatly increased the amount of punishment they could receive in battle and was only used when the most dire of battles were expected.
